page.title: 05Leisure & Recreation
page.content: The leisure and recreation facilities fall into two broad catagories: sports areas and public houses. Apart from the Hallamshire Golf Club, the area boasts a well utilised football and cricket ground used by the Hallam Football and and Cricket Club which fields teams in the local county senior leagues. Hallam Middle School has three football pitches and a cricket pitch which are used by local youth teams, notably Hallam Rangers which run football teams in the U.10 to U.16 age groups. Additionally, Birkdale Prep. School has a large recreation area with rugby and football pitches. There are four public houses in the area, the oldest being {The Three Merry Lads }and{The {Sportsman},behind which are extensive playing fields. More modern is the{ {Shiny Sheff}(from H.M.S. Sheffield)
